column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////If you're not keen on almonds or dark chocolate
column2: then I don't know what to tell you. They do have fruit croissants in rotation
column3: so if they're available when you go
column4: get it! I guess you could also get plain
column5: but I think that'd be very boring. And for $4 per croissant
column6: you need to get something that isn't boring.
